short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the world like Trump does.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See the world through Trump's eyes.

ISIS = Evil Losers
Hillary Clinton = Crooked Hillary
CNN = Clinton News Network
New York Times = Fake News
Kim Jong Un = Little Rocket Man
Coffee = covfefe

And many more!
